it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.remote

Class RMIStreamProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.remote.RMIStreamProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIStreamProvider, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIStreamProvider
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RMIStreamProvider, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class is used to instantiate the IDs of message proxies shared between the client and the server
    Author:
    Carlo Dell'Acqua
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      A queue of RMIViews waiting to be taken out

        ref

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RMIStreamProvider(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,RMIView> rmiViewSupplier)
      Constructs an RMIStreamProvider which will translate clients' connection requests into the instantiation of RMIViews that will wait into a queue waiting to be taken out

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIStreamProvider

        public RMIStreamProvider(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,RMIView> rmiViewSupplier)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Constructs an RMIStreamProvider which will translate clients' connection requests into the instantiation of RMIViews that will wait into a queue waiting to be taken out
        Parameters:
        rmiViewSupplier - a factory function needed to generate RMIViews
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an exception regarding the RMI API occurs

    • Method Detail

      • getRMIView

        public RMIView getRMIView(int timeout,
                          java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                          java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Dequeues an RMIView from the queue
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum timeout
        unit - the unit of the timeout
        Returns:
        an RMIView
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is forced to stop
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the maximum timeout has been reached without obtaining any RMIView

      • connect

        public java.lang.String connect()
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method called by the client who wants to connect to the server
        Specified by:
        connect in interface RMIStreamProvider
        Returns:
        a unique identifier of the message proxy that will enable the IO stream of messages
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is forced to stop
